page.title: 15Mrs.Lowe of Monks Kirby
page.content: Mrs.Lowe has lived in Monks Kirby for 51 years now and would never move.The house she is in is her third house here and she said that she would rather be down in the village with the people she knows.If she had to move she said she would move near Rugby with her daughters.When she came here there were no council houses here at all.She has a dog to keep her company called Jane.She used to live in Church Lawford and got married there.When girls used to board at the Convent she used to go and iron the dresses there.When she moved here the bus used to cost 7p return and they were very different to what they are now.She told us that there used to be a chapel down Bell Lane and said that Monks Kirby has definitely changed for the better.
